title: Hour 1: Boiling Bucs
description:
Stephen A., Marcus Spears, Ryan Clark and Kendrick Perkins debate if the Nets will have a worse season than the Knicks, who the biggest threat to the Bills/Chiefs in the AFC and if the Packers playoff chances are toast if they lose Sunday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Is the Tampa Bay Buccaneers season cooked?
